title: Sivo-Barnes Cancer Research Fund
description: To be used by Frank Barnes and Frank Sivo toward Cancer Research using electro-magnetic treatment to target and shrink cancer cells in conjunction with the University of Colorado.  The initial focus of this research will be pancreatic cancer.
marketingContent: To be used by Frank Barnes and Frank Sivo toward Cancer Research using electro-magnetic treatment to target and shrink cancer cells in conjunction with the University of Colorado.  The initial focus of this research will be pancreatic cancer.
